title: Zen Master of the Azure Falls and the Water Dragon
prompt: (masterpiece), (best quality), highly detailed, 9:16 aspect ratio. A serene, bald young monk wearing saffron and red robes, sitting in a cross-legged meditative pose on a stone perch overlooking a pond. Majestic twin waterfalls cascade down from stylized, misty teal mountains in the background. Flanking the waterfall are vibrant pink cherry blossom (sakura) trees. A translucent, ethereal azure water spirit dragon swirls dynamically around the monk, symbolizing spiritual power. Below, a tranquil pond with swimming koi fish and lily pads. Traditional Chinese landscape painting composition (Shanshui), crisp lines, soft watercolor shading, official Donghua Chinese animation style.
